name: The Exorcist: Legion VR
summary: Experience the game called one of the most terrifying experiences in VR. What an excellent day for an exorcism!  Now enhanced for Quest 3 and optimized for Quest 2 headsets. Described as one of the most disturbing experiences available for virtual reality, The Exorcist: Legion features FIVE connected stories and features a variety of demonic entities, exorcism tools, hidden artifacts and atmospheric locations.
